query:
UPDATE backer_stakes SET (id, 
backer_id, 
stake, 
date, 
disbursement_id) = ((CASE $2::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $3 ELSE id END), (CASE $4::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $5 ELSE backer_id END), (CASE $6::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $7 ELSE stake END), (CASE $8::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $9 ELSE date END), (CASE $10::boolean WHEN TRUE THEN $11 ELSE disbursement_id END)) WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id as "id!: i32", 
backer_id as "backer_id!: i32", 
stake as "stake!: Decimal", 
date as "date!: UtcDateTime", 
disbursement_id as "disbursement_id!: i32"
